channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows HelpPane
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows HelpPane

item.title: CVE-2017-0100|2024-08-05T12:55:18.972Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20helppane
item.description: A DCOM object in Helppane.exe in Microsoft Windows 7 SP1; Windows Server 2008 R2; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka "Windows HelpPane Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
